title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 15 -  finally available!
description:
In this video, we'll review the release notes for Sim Update 15. As the individual fixes have already been covered extensively in the Sim Update 15 beta videos, I suggest checking those out as well. Moreover, you'll find a number of videos on this channel about the new features included in this update. For your convenience, I've compiled a list of those videos below:

Beta build release notes video discussing new functionality:

- First beta build: https://youtu.be/TK_yW5Uyi9o
- Second beta build: https://youtu.be/PLs9072Kl7E
- Third beta build: https://youtu.be/hO4XzrvOwjY
- Fourth beta build: https://youtu.be/uXlXZd--dGs
- Fifth beta build: https://youtu.be/pbM-kTAcaUY
- Sixth beta build: https://youtu.be/ITO_21FKWW8
- Seventh beta build: https://youtu.be/9veLazcUxc4
- Eight beta build: https://youtu.be/TjxTRejMDeU
- Ninth beta build: https://youtu.be/jMjlYQckpV0

Review of new functionality:

- G3x touch review: https://youtu.be/p8N8afCicyU
- A320 V2: MCDU Simbrief: https://youtu.be/9Um2eoOErxo
- A320 V2: EFB Simbrief: https://youtu.be/9cLHkLJRLFA
